summary: This document is a property deed and associated filings for the transfer of 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY, from Nine East 71st Street Corporation to Maple, Inc. on December 23, 2011. Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the President of the seller corporation and signs on its behalf. The document also includes a property tax bill from 2019 showing outstanding charges and a 2019 lis pendens filed by the United States against Jeffrey Epstein for forfeiture related to the property. This is a 2019 property tax bill from the New York City Department of Finance for a property with an estimated market value of $55,931,000. It details outstanding charges, payment instructions, and property tax calculations for a 'Small Home' class property.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.role: President of Nine East 71st Street Corporation
persons.context: Signs as President of the grantor/seller corporation (Nine East 71st Street Corporation) in the deed transferring 9 East 71st Street to Maple, Inc. Also appears as the debtor in a 2019 lis pendens filed by the United States for forfeiture against the property.

persons.name: Erika Kellerhals
persons.context: Listed as the buyer's attorney for Maple, Inc. and as the notary public for several affidavits and acknowledgments within the document package.

persons.name: Agustin
persons.context: Listed as the presenter/agent for the title company (TitleAssociates - Pick-up/Agustin as agent for Stewart Title) on the recording cover page.

persons.name: Jfeldman
persons.context: Email contact (jfeldman@titleassociates.com) listed for the title company presenting the document.

persons.name: Jack S. Levey
persons.context: Attorney referenced in a 1989 deed excerpt as the return address for a prior transaction involving the property and Birch Wathen School, Inc.

connections.description: Epstein is identified as the President of the corporation, signing legal documents on its behalf.
Kellerhals is listed as the attorney for the buyer, Maple, Inc., in the property transfer.
Epstein, as President of the seller corporation, executed the deed selling 9 East 71st Street to Maple, Inc. for a nominal sum ($10).
Agustin is listed as an agent acting for the title company, Stewart Title.

events.title: Property Transfer of 9 East 71st Street
events.description: Nine East 71st Street Corporation, with Jeffrey Epstein as President, transfers the property at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY, to Maple, Inc. for $10 and other consideration.

events.title: Lis Pendens Filed by United States
events.description: A lis pendens (notice of pending lawsuit) is filed by the United States of America against Jeffrey Epstein for forfeiture related to the property at 9 East 71st Street.

events.title: Prior Court Order for Property
events.description: A Supreme Court Order from February 6, 1989, is referenced in a prior deed excerpt, indicating a legal proceeding related to the property involving Birch Wathen School, Inc.

events.title: Property Tax Payment Deadline
events.description: Deadline for paying the total amount due of $345,286.05 to save $1,735.11 in interest.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein, as President of Nine East 71st Street Corporation, executed the deed transferring the notorious New York City mansion at 9 East 71st Street to Maple, Inc., a U.S. Virgin Islands corporation, on December 23, 2011.
The consideration for the multi-million dollar property transfer was listed as "TEN DOLLARS ($10.00) and other good and valuable consideration."

A 2019 lis pendens (Case Index 19 CR.490) was filed by the United States of America against Jeffrey Epstein for forfeiture related to this property, indicating it was subject to post-arrest asset seizure proceedings.
The document package includes a 2019 property tax bill for the address showing outstanding charges of $173,510.58 owed by Maple, Inc.

The corporate structure shows Epstein-controlled entities (Nine East 71st Street Corp.) transferring assets to another offshore entity (Maple, Inc., based in the U.S. Virgin Islands) potentially for asset protection or estate planning.
The property has an estimated market value of $55,931,000 and is classified as a 'Small Home. Less Than 4 Families'.
The total property tax due is $347,021.16 annually, with a total amount due of $345,286.05 if paid by July 1, 2019.
The property's account number is 1-01386-0010, which corresponds to its borough, block, and lot.
The document is a standard NYC property tax bill with payment instructions and public health reminders, with no direct mention of individuals related to the Epstein case.
